text: Þis is þæra C hyda landboc þe Æþelstan cyng edniwan gebocode into þam bisceopstole to ealdan mynstre to lofe þære halgan þrynnysse.
And þam halgan apostolum Petre & Paule swa swa cynewalc cing hit ær þydær in gæbocode hæfde for his sawla & for ellæs his leodscypes gesundfullnessæ.
Ðis synd þa landgemero to Duntune erest of crawan crundul on wereðan hille on fyrdinges lea.
Þonne on þone hagan to witan wyrðe.
Þonne ofer þone feld on hagan ut þurh brember wudu on þone stenenan stopul andlang herepaðes to fobban wylle.
Andlang herepaðes to þes hagan ende to feger hylde forda.
On þone hagan on ceorles hlewe.
Andlang weges on þa dic to bymera cumbe.
And þer þwyres ofer þreo crundelas.
Þwyres ofer ða dune to wudu beorh hylle ofer berigan cumb on eblesburnan.
